entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
